title: Switzerland - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Switzerland stands at AAA with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Switzerland was last set at Aaa with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Switzerland was last reported at AAA with stable outlook. DBRS's credit rating for Switzerland is AAA with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Switzerland thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Switzerland as reported by major credit rating agencies.
